GK19bahcar1u:7: cakre puṇyaṃ sarasvatyā yo varṣamiva bhāratam // 1.3 //
GK19bahcar1u:11: utpādakā na bahavaḥ kavayaḥ śarabhā iva // 1.5 //
GK19bahcar1u:19: katheva bhāratī yasya na vyāpnoti jagattrayam // 1.9 //
GK19bahcar1u:32: nirgatāsu na vā kasya kālidāsasya sūktiṣu /
GK19bahcar1u:45: samupaviṣṭaḥ sunāsīrapramukhairgīrvāṇaiḥ parivṛto brahnodyāḥ kathāḥ kurvannanyāśca
GK19bahcar1u:47: tathāsīnaṃ ca taṃ tribhuvanapratīkṣyaṃ manudakṣacākṣuṣaprabhṛtayaḥ prajāpatayaḥ sarve ca saptarṣipuraḥsarā maharṣayaḥ siṣevire /
GK19bahcar1u:53: athātiroṣaṇaḥ prakṛtyā mahātapā muniratrestanayastārāpaterbhratā nāmnā durvāsā dvitīyena mandapālanāmnā muninā saha kalahāyamānaḥ sāmagāyankrodhāndho visvaramakarot /
GK19bahcar1u:54: sarveṣu ca teṣu śāpabhayapratipannamauneṣu muniṣvanyālāpalīlayā cāvadhīrayati kamalasambhave,
GK19bahcar1u:55: bhagavatī kumārī kiñcidunmuktabālabhāve bhūṣitanavayauvane vayasi vartamānā,
GK19bahcar1u:66: śrotramekaṃ visvaraśravaṇakaluṣitaṃ prakṣālayantīvā pāṅganirgatena locanāśrujalapravāheṇetaraśravaṇena ca vikasitasitasindhu vāramañjarījuṣā hasateva prakaṭitavidyāmadā,
GK19bahcar1u:69: vāṅmayamiva nirmalaṃ dikṣu daśanajyotsnālokaṃ vikirantī devī sarasvatī śrutvā jahāsa /
GK19bahcar1u:70: dṛṣṭvā ca tāṃ tathā hasantīṃ sa muniḥ “āḥ pāpakāriṇi,
GK19bahcar1u:72: māmupahasasi' ityuktvā śiraḥkampaśīryamāṇabandhaviśarārorunmiṣatpiṅgalimno jaṭākalāpasya rociṣā siñcanniva roṣadahanadraveṇa daśa diśaḥ,
GK19bahcar1u:78: kopakampataralitāṅgulinā kareṇa prasādanalagnāmakṣaramālāmivākṣamālāmākṣipya kāmaṇḍalavena vāriṇā samupaspṛśya śāpajalaṃ jagrāha /
GK19bahcar1u:79: atrāntare svayambhuvo 'bhyāśe samupaviṣṭā devī mūrtimatī pīyūṣaphenapaṭalapāṇḍuraṃ kalpadrumadukūlavalkalaṃ vasānā,
GK19bahcar1u:82: skandhāvalambinā sudhāphenadhavalena tapaḥprabhāvakuṇḍalīkṛtena gaṅgāsrītaseva yogapaṭṭakena viracitavaikakṣyakā,
GK19bahcar1u:96: kathamātmaskhalitavilakṣaḥ surāsuramunimanujavṛndavandanīyāṃ tribhuvanamātaraṃ bhagavatīṃ sarasvatīṃ śaptumabhilaṣasi' ityabhidadhānā,
GK19bahcar1u:103: skhalitamekaṃ kṣamasva' iti baddhāñjalipuṭaiḥ prasādyamāno 'pi svaśiṣyaiḥ,
GK19bahcar1u:108: adhastādgaccha martyalokam' ityuktvā tacchā podakaṃ visasarja /
GK19bahcar1u:111: asaṃskṛtamatayo 'pi jātyaiva dvijanmāno mānanīyāḥ' ityabhidadhānā sarasvatyeva nyavārayat /
GK19bahcar1u:112: atha tāṃ tathā śaptāṃ sarasvatīṃ dṛṣṭvā pitāmaho bhagavānkamalotpattilagnamṛṇālasūtrāmiva dhvalayajñopavītinīṃ tanumudrahan,
GK19bahcar1u:121: viśuddhayā hi dhiyā paśyanti kṛtabuddhayaḥ sarvānarthānasataḥ sato vā /
GK19bahcar1u:125: paradoṣadarśanadakṣā dṛṣṭiriva kupitā buddhirna te ātmarāgadoṣaṃ paśyati /
GK19bahcar1u:129: nahiṃ kopakaluṣitā vimṛśati matiḥ kartavyamakartavyaṃ vā /
GK19bahcar1u:138: kathaṃ lokavināśāya te viṣapādapasyeva jaṭāvalkalāni jātāni /
GK19bahcar1u:139: anucitā khalvasya muniveṣasya hārayaṣṭiriva vṛttamuktā cittavṛttiḥ /
GK19bahcar1u:140: śailūṣa iva vṛthā vahasi kṛtrimamupaśamaśūnyena cetasā tāpasākalpam /
GK19bahcar1u:143: na khalvenahamūkā eḍā jaḍā vā sarvaṃ ete maharṣayaḥ /
GK19bahcar1u:144: roṣadoṣaniṣadye svahṛdaye nigrāhye kimarthamasi nigṛhītavānanāgasāṃ sarasvatīm /
GK19bahcar1u:146: yairyāpyatāṃ yātyavidagdho janaḥ' ityuktvā punarāha-- “vatse sarasvati,
GK19bahcar1u:152: sarasvatyapi śaptā kiñcidadhomukhī dhavalakṛṣṇaśārā kṛṣṇājinalekhāmiva dṛṣṭimurasi
GK19bahcar1u:159: madhumadamuditakāminīkopakuṭilakaṭākṣakṣipyamāṇa iva kṣepīyaḥ kṣitidharaśikharamavatarati taruṇatarakapilapanalohite lokaikacakṣuṣi bhagavati,
GK19bahcar1u:161: aparāhṇapracāracalite cāmariṇi crāmīkarataṭatāḍanaraṇitaradane radati surasravantīrodhāṃsi svairamairāvate,
GK19bahcar1u:170: jaladevatātapatre patrarathakulakalatrāntaḥpurasaudhe nijamadhumadhurāmodini kṛtamadhupamudi mumudiṣamāṇe kumudavane,
GK19bahcar1u:176: medinīṃ mīlayati navavayasi tamasi taruṇataratimirapaṭalapāṭanapaṭīyasi sa,
GK19bahcar1u:179: samuci mecakitavikacitakuvalayasarasi śaśadharakaranikarakacagrahāvile viloyamāne māninīmanasīva sarvarīśabdacikuracaye cāṣapakṣatviṣi tamasi,
GK19bahcar1u:184: spaṣṭe pradosamaye sāvitrī śūnyahṛdayāmiva kimapi dhyāyantīṃ sāsrāṃ sarasvatīmavādīt--“sakhi,
GK19bahcar1u:185: tribhuvanopadeśadānadakṣāyāstava puro jihvā jihreti me jalapantī /
GK19bahcar1u:186: jānāsyeva yādṛśyo visaṃsthulā guṇavatyapi jane durjanavannirdākṣiṇyāḥ kṣaṇabhaṅginyo duratikramaṇīyā na ramaṇīyā daivasya vāmā vṛttayaḥ /
GK19bahcar1u:187: niṣkāraṇā ca nikārakaṇikāpi kaluṣayati manasvinoṣapi mānasamasadṛśajanādāpatantī /
GK19bahcar1u:189: atisukumāraṃ ca janaṃ saṃtāpaparamāṇavo mālatīkusumamiva mlānimānayanti /
GK19bahcar1u:190: mahatāṃ copari tipatannaṇurapi sṛṇiriva kariṇāṃ kleśaḥ kadarthanāyālam /
GK19bahcar1u:192: dārayati dāruṇaḥ krakacpāta iva hṛdayaṃ saṃstutajanavirahaḥ,
GK19bahcar1u:195: api ca purākṛte karmaṇi balavati śubhe 'śubhe vā phalakṛti tiṣṭhatyadhiṣṭhātari prarākṛte
GK19bahcar1u:196: karmaṇi balavati śubhe 'śubhe vā phalakṛti tiṣṭhatyadhiṣṭhātari praṣṭhe pṛṣṭhataśca
GK19bahcar1u:198: idaṃ ca te tribhuvanamaṅgalaikakamalamamaṅgalabhūtāḥ kathamiva mukhamapavitrayantyaśrubindavaḥ /
GK19bahcar1u:203: keṣu vā dhanyeṣu tapovanadhāmasu tapastantī rathātumicchasi /
GK19bahcar1u:205: ananyaśaraṇā caidyaiva prabhṛti pratipadyasva manasā vācā kriyayā ca sarvavidyāvidhātāra
GK19bahcar1u:208: alpīyasaiva kālena sa te śāpaśokaviratiṃ vitariṣyita' iti /
GK19bahcar1u:210: tvayā saha vicarantyā na me kāñcidapi pīṇāmutpādayiṣyati brahnalokavirahaḥ śāpaśoko vā /
GK19bahcar1u:212: api ca tvameva vetsi me bhuvi dharmadhāmāni samādhisādhānāni yogayogyāni ca sthānāni sthātum' ityevamabhidhāya virarāma /
GK19bahcar1u:218: avatara kalahaṃsi vāpikāṃ punarapi yāsyasi paṅkajālayam' //
GK19bahcar1u:221: mānayāmi munervacanam' ityuktvotthāya kṛtamahītalāvataraṇasaṃkalpā parityajya viyogaviklavaṃ
GK19bahcar1u:222: svaparijanaṃ jñātivargamavigaṇayyāvagaṇā triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya caturmukhaṃ kathamapyanunayanivartitānuyāyivrativrātā
GK19bahcar1u:252: sphāṭikaśilāpaṭṭaśayanamivāmbaraśriyāḥ svacchaśiśirasurasavāripūṇaṃ bhagavataḥ pitāmahasyāpatyaṃ hiraṇyavāhanāmānaṃ mahānadam,
GK19bahcar1u:254: dṛṣṭvāca taṃ rāmaṇīyakahṛtadayā tasyaiva tīre vāsamaracayat /
GK19bahcar1u:256: madhuramayūravirutayaḥ kusumapāṃśupaṭalasikatilatarutalāḥ parimalamattamadhupaveṇīvīṇāraṇitaramaṇīyā ramayanti māṃ mandīkṛtamandākinīdyuterasya mahānadasyopakaṇṭhabhūmayaḥ /
GK19bahcar1u:257: pakṣapāti ca hṛdayamatraiva sthātuṃ me' iti /
GK19bahcar1u:258: abhinanditavacanā ca tatheti tayā tasya paścime tīre samavātarat /
GK19bahcar1u:259: ekasmiṃśca śucau śilātalasanāthe taṭalatāmaṇḍape gṛhabuddhiṃ babandha /
GK19bahcar1u:260: viśrāntā ca nāticirādutthāya sāvitryā sārdhaṃmuccitārcanakusumā sasnau /
GK19bahcar1u:261: pulinapṛṣṭhapratiṣṭhitaśivaliṅgā ca bhaktyā paramayā parabrahnapuraḥsarāṃ samyaṅmudrābandhavihitaparikarāṃ
GK19bahcar1u:264: ayatnopanatena phalamūlenāmṛtarasamamapyatiśiśayiṣamāṇena ca svādimnā śiśireṇa śoṇavāriṇā śarīsthitimakarot /
GK19bahcar1u:267: evamatikrāmatsu divaseṣu gacchati ca kāle yāmamātrodgate ca ravāvuttarasyāṃ kakubhi pratiśabdapūritavanagahvaraṃ gambhīratārataraṃ turaṅgaheṣitahlādamaśṛṇot
GK19bahcar1u:268: upajātakutūhalā ca nirgatya latāmaṇḍapādvilokayantī vikacaketakīgarbhapatrapāṇḍuraṃ rajaḥsaṅghātaṃ nātidavīyasi saṃmukhamapitantamapaśyat /
GK19bahcar1u:269: krameṇa ca sāmīpyopajāyamānābhivyakti tasminmahati śapharodaradhūsare rajasi payasīva makaracakraṃ plavamānaṃ puraḥ pradhāvamānena,
GK19bahcar1u:287: madhye ca tasya sārdhacandreṇa muktāphalajālamālinā vividharatnakhaṇḍakhacitena śaṅkhakṣīraphenapāṇḍureṇa kṣīrodeneva svayaṃ lakṣmīṃ dātumāgatena gaganagatenātapatreṇa kṛtacchāyam,
GK19bahcar1u:294: āyatanayananadīsīmāntasetubandhena lalāṭataṭaśaśimaṇiśilātalagalitena āntisalilasrotaseva drāghīyasā nāsāvaṃśena śobhamānam,
GK19bahcar1u:316: agrataḥ paṭhato vandinaḥ subhāṣitamutkaṇṭakitakapolaphalakena lagnakarṇotpalakesarapakṣmaśakaleneva mukhaśaśinā bāvayantam /
GK19bahcar1u:352: atha sa yuvā puroyāyināṃ yathādarśanaṃ pratinivṛtyātivismitamanasāṃ kathayatāṃ padātīnāṃ
GK19bahcar1u:356: nivāritaparijanaśca tena dvitīyena sādhunā sahacaraṇābhyāmeva savinayamupasasarpa /
GK19bahcar1u:357: kṛtopasaṃgrahaṇau tau sāvitrī samaṃ sarasvatyā kisalayāsanadānādinā sakusumaphalārghyāvasānena vanavāsocitenātithyena yathākramamupajagrāha
GK19bahcar1u:358: āsīnayāśca tayorāsīna nāticiramiva sthitvā taṃ dvitīyaṃ pravayasamuddiśyāvādīt--“ārya,
GK19bahcar1u:363: apragalbhamapi janaṃ prabhavatā praśrayeṇārpitaṃ mano madhviva vācālayati /
GK19bahcar1u:364: ayatnenaivātinamre sādhau dhanuṣīva guṇaḥ parāṃ koṭimāropayati visrambhaḥ /
GK19bahcar1u:365: janayanti ca vismayamatidhīradhiyāmapyadṛṣṭapūrvā dṛśyamānā jagati sraṣṭuḥ sṛṣṭyatiśayāḥ /
GK19bahcar1u:367: saujanyaparatantrā ceyaṃ devānāṃpriyasyātibhadratā kārayati kathāṃ na tu yuvatijanasahotthā taralatā /
GK19bahcar1u:371: kiṃnāmno vā samṛddhatapasaḥ piturayamamṛtavarṣī kaustubhamaṇiriva haterhṛdayamāhlādayati?
GK19bahcar1u:372: kā cāsya tribhuvananamasyā vibhātasaṃdhyeva mahatastejeso jananī?
GK19bahcar1u:374: āryaparijñāne 'pyayameva kramaḥ kautukānurodhino hṛdayasya' ityuktavatyāṃ tasyāṃ prakaṭitaśrayo 'sau prativyājahāra--“āyuṣmati,
GK19bahcar1u:376: na kevalamānanaṃ hṛdayamapi ca te candramayamiva sudhāśīkaraśītalairāhlādayati vacobhiḥ /
GK19bahcar1u:377: saujanyajanmabhūmayo bhūyasā śūbhana sajjananirmāṇaśilpakalā iva bhāvadṛśyo dṛśyante /
GK19bahcar1u:378: dūre tāvadanyonyasyābhilapanamabhijātaiḥ saha dṛśo 'pi miśrībhūtā mahatīṃ bhūmimāropayanti /
GK19bahcar1u:379: śrūyatām--ayaṃ khalu bhūṣaṇaṃ bhārgavavaṃśasya bhagavato bhūrbhuvaḥsvastritayatilakasya,
GK19bahcar1u:383: janyanyasya jitajagato 'nekapārthivasahasrānuyātasya śaryātasya sutā rājaputrī tribhuvanakanyāratnaṃ sukanyā nāma /
GK19bahcar1u:384: tāṃ khalu devīmantarvatnīṃ viditvā vaijanane māsi prasavāya pitā patyuḥ pārśvātsvagṛhamānāyayata /
GK19bahcar1u:385: asūta ca sā tatra devī dīrghāyuṣamenam /
GK19bahcar1u:386: avardhatānehasā ca tatraivāyamānanditajñātivargo bālastārakarāja iva rājīvalocano rājagṛhe /
GK19bahcar1u:390: kālena copārūḍhayauvanamimamālokyāhamivāsāvapyanubhavatu mukhakamalāvalokanānandamasyeti mātāmahaḥ kathaṅkathamapyenaṃ piturantikamadhunā vyasarjayet
GK19bahcar1u:391: māmapi tasyaiva devasya sugṛhītanāmnaḥ śaryātasyājñākāriṇaṃ vikukṣināmānaṃ bhṛtyaparamāṇumavadhārayatu bhavatī /
GK19bahcar1u:394: uttamānāṃ ca cirantanatā janayatyanujīvinyapi jane kiyanmātramapi mandākṣam /
GK19bahcar1u:396: etaśca gavyūtimātramiva pāreśoṇaṃ tasya bhagavataścyavanasya svanāmnā nirmitavyapadeśaṃ cyāvanaṃ nāma caitrarathakalpaṃ kānanaṃ nivāsaḥ /
GK19bahcar1u:398: yadi ca vo gṛhītakṣaṇaṃ dākṣiṇyamanavahelaṃ vā hadayamasmākamupari bhūmirvā prasādānāmayaṃ janaḥ śravaṇārhe vā,
GK19bahcar1u:399: tato na vimānanīyo 'yaṃ naḥ prathamaḥ praṇayaḥ kutūhalasya /
GK19bahcar1u:403: tatkathaya katamo vaṃśaḥ spṛhaṇīyatāṃ janmanā gītaḥ /
GK19bahcar1u:404: kā ceyamatrabhavatī bhavatyāḥ samīpe samavāya iva virodhināṃ padārthānām /
GK19bahcar1u:417: āryeṇa na vismaraṇīyo 'yamanuṣaṅgadṛṣṭo janaḥ' itya bhidhāya tūṣṇīmabhūt /
GK19bahcar1u:424: turagārūḍhaṃ ca taṃ prayāntaṃ sarasvatī suciramuttambhitapakṣmaṇā niścalatārakeṇa likhiteneva cakṣuṣā vyalokayat /
GK19bahcar1u:425: uttīrya ca śoṇama cireṇaiva kālena dadhīcaḥ piturāśramapadaṃ jagāma /
GK19bahcar1u:426: gata ca tasminsā tāmeva diśamālokayantī suciramatiṣṭhat /
GK19bahcar1u:428: atha muhūrtamātramiva sthitvā smṛtvā ca tāṃ tasya rūpasapadaṃ punaḥpunarvyasma yatāsyā hṛdayam /
GK19bahcar1u:431: aprihatamapi manastenaiva sādhaṃmagāt ajāyata ca navapallava iva bālavanalatāyāḥ kuto 'pyasyā anurāgaścetasi /
GK19bahcar1u:432: tataḥ prabhṛti ca sālasyeva śūnyeva sanidreva dikasamanayat /
GK19bahcar1u:433: aratamupayāti ca pratyakparyastamaṇḍale lāṅgalikāstabakatāmratviṣi kamalinīkāmuke kaṭhorasālasaśiraḥśoṇaśociṣi sāvitre trayīmaye tejasi,
GK19bahcar1u:434: taruṇataratamālaśyāmale ca malinayati vyoma vyomavyāpini timirasaṃcaye,
GK19bahcar1u:435: saṃcaratsiddhasundarīnūpuraravānusāriṇi ca mandaṃ mandaṃ mandākinīhaṃsa iva samutsarpati
GK19bahcar1u:436: śaśini gaganatalam kṛtasaṃdhyāpraṇāmā niśāmukha eva nipatya vimuktāṅgī pallavaśayane tasthau /
GK19bahcar1u:437: sāvitryapi kṛtvā yathākriyamāṇaṃ sāyantanaṃ kriyākalāpamucite śayanakāle kisalayaśayanamabhajata jātanidrā ca suṣvāpa /
GK19bahcar1u:445: puṇyabhāñji tāni cakṣūṃṣi cetāṃsi yauvanāni vā straiṇāni,
GK19bahcar1u:447: kṣaṇaṃ nu darśayatā ca tamanyajanmaniteneva me phalitamadharmeṇa /
GK19bahcar1u:459: atha gaṇarātrāpagame nivartamānastenaiva vartmanā taṃ deśaṃ samāgatya tathaiva nivāritaparijanaśchatradhāradvitīyo vikukṣirḍuḍhauke /
GK19bahcar1u:460: sarasvatī tu taṃ dūrādeva saṃmukhamāgacchantaṃ prītyā sasaṃbhramamutthāya vanamṛgīvodgrīvā vilokayantī mārgapariśrāntamasnapayadiva dhavalitadaśadiśā dṛśā /
GK19bahcar1u:461: kṛtāsanaparigrahaṃ tu taṃ prītyā sāvitrī papraccha--“ārya,
GK19bahcar1u:468: anvakṣamāgamiṣyatyeva mālatīti nāmnā bāṇinī vārtāṃ vo vijñātum /
GK19bahcar1u:471: sāvitrī samabhāṣata--“atimahānubhāvaḥ khalu kumāro yenaivanamavijñāyamāne kṣaṇadṛṣṭe 'pi jane paricitimanubadhnāti /
GK19bahcar1u:472: tasya hi gacchato yadṛcchayā kathamapyaṃsukamiva mārgalatāsu mānasamasmāsu muhūrtamāsaktamāsīt /
GK19bahcar1u:474: alasaḥ khalu loko yadevaṃ sulabhasauhārdāni yena kenacinna krīṇāti mahatāṃ manāṃsi /
GK19bahcar1u:475: so 'yamaudāryātiśayaḥ so 'pi mahātmanāmitarajanadurlabho yenopakaraṇīkurvanti tribhuvanam' iti /
GK19bahcar1u:477: aparedyurudyati bhagavati dyumaṇāvuddāmadyutāvabhidrutatārake tiraskṛtatamasi tāmarasavyāsavyasanini sahasraraśmau śoṇamutīryāyāntī,
GK19bahcar1u:479: sphuṭitātimuktakakusumastabakasamatviṣi saṭāle mahati mṛgapatāviva gaurī turaṅgame sthita,
GK19bahcar1u:489: kucapūrṇakalaśayorupari ratnaprālambamālikāmaruṇaharitakiraṇakisalayinīṃ kasyāpi puṇyavato hṛdayapraveśavanamālikāmiva baddhāṃ dhārayantī,
GK19bahcar1u:490: prakoṣṭhaniviṣṭasyaikasya hāṭakakaṭakasya marakatamakaravedikāsanāthasya haritīkṛtadigantābhirmaṃyūkhasaṃtatibhiḥ sthalakamalinībiriva lakṣmīśaṅkhayānugamyamānā,
GK19bahcar1u:496: tamālaśyāmalena mṛgamadāmodaniṣyadinā tilakabindunā mudritamiva manobhavasarvasvaṃ vadanamudvahantī,
GK19bahcar1u:515: dūrādeva ca dadhīcapremṇā sarasvatyā luṇṭhiteva manorathaiḥ,
GK19bahcar1u:531: krameṇa cātīte madhyandinasamaye śoṇamavatīrṇāyāṃ sāvitryāṃ snātumutsāritaparijanā sākūteva mālatī kusumasrastaśāyinīṃ samupasṛtya sarasvatīmābabhāṣe--devi,
GK19bahcar1u:534: sarasvatī tu dadhīcasadeśāśaṅkinī kiṃ vakṣyatīti stananihitavāmakaranakharakiraṇadanturitamudbhidyamānakutūhalāṅkuranikaramiva hṛdayamuttarīyakūlavalkalaikadeśena
GK19bahcar1u:536: samutphullasya mukhaśaśino lāvaṇyapravāheṇa śṛṅgārarasenevāplāvayantī sakalaṃ jīvalokam,
GK19bahcar1u:540: “upāṃśu kathaya' iti kapolatalanatibimbitāṃ lajjayā karṇamūlamiva mālatīṃ praveśayantī madhurayā girā sudhīramuvāca--“sakhi mālati,
GK19bahcar1u:544: sā na kācidyā na bhavasi me svasā sakhī praṇayinī prāṇasamā ca /
GK19bahcar1u:545: niyujyatāṃ yāvataḥ kāryasya kṣamaṃ kṣodīyasī garīyasī vā śarīrakamidam /
GK19bahcar1u:557: na ca bāliśatā capalatā cāraṇatā vā vācālatāyāḥ kāraṇam /
GK19bahcar1u:560: yadaiva dṛṣṭāsi devena tata evārabyāsya kāmo guruḥ,
GK19bahcar1u:587: tadevamagocare girāmasīti śrutvā devī pramāṇam' ityabhidhāya tūṣṇīmabhūta /
GK19bahcar1u:594: atiprasādāya' iti vyāhṛtya praharṣaparavaśā praṇamya prajavinā turageṇa tatāra śoṇam /
GK19bahcar1u:597: utkaṇṭhābhārabhṛtā ca tāmyatā cetasā kalpāyitaṃ kathaṅkathamapi divasaśeṣamanaiṣīt /
GK19bahcar1u:600: prahasitāmiva sitāṃ diśaṃ paurandarīṃ darīmiva kesariṇi muñcati candramasi sarasvatī
GK19bahcar1u:601: śucini cīnāṃśukasukumāratare taraṅgiṇi dugūlakomalaśayana iva śoṇasaikate samupaviṣṭā
GK19bahcar1u:604: ayamasāvāhṛto hṛdayadayito janaḥ' iti śravaṇasamīpavartinā nivedyamānamadanasaṃdeśevendunā,
GK19bahcar1u:605: vikīryamāṇanakhakiraṇacakravālena vālavyajanīkṛtacandrakalākalāpeneva kareṇa vījayantī svedinaṃ kapolapaṭṭam,
GK19bahcar1u:606: “atra dadhīcādṛte na kenacitpraveṣṭavyam' iti tiraśvīnaṃ cittabhuvā pātitāṃ vilāsavetralatāmiva
GK19bahcar1u:607: bālamṛṇālikāmadhistanaṃ stanayantī kathamapi hṛdayena vahanti pratipālayāmāsa āsīccāsyā
GK19bahcar1u:608: manasi--“ahamapi nāma sarasvatī yatrāmunā manaujanmanā jānatyeva paravaśīkṛtā /
GK19bahcar1u:609: tatra kā gaṇanetarāsu tapasvinīṣvatitaralāsu taruṇīṣu' iti /
GK19bahcar1u:618: antaḥsphuratā mattamadanakarikarṇaśahkhāyamānena pratimendunā prathamasamāgamavilāsavilakṣasmiteneva dhavalīkriyamāṇaikakapolodaro mālatīdvitīyo dadhīcaḥ /
GK19bahcar1u:619: āgatya ca hṛdayagatadayitānūpuraravavimiśrayeva haṃsagadgadayā girā kṛtasaṃbhāṣaṇo yathā manmathaḥ samājñāpayati,
GK19bahcar1u:628: tasmai ca jātamātrāyaiva “samyaksarahasyāḥ sarvevedāḥ sarvāṇi ca śāstrāṇi sakalāśca kalā matprabhāvātṝ svayamāvirbhaviṣyanti' iti varamadātṝ
GK19bahcar1u:629: sadbhartṛślāghayā darśayitumiva hṛdayenādāya dadhīcaṃ pitāmahādeśātsamaṃ sāvitryā punarapi brahnalokamāruroha /
GK19bahcar1u:630: gatāyāṃ ca tasyāṃ dadhīco 'pi hṛdaye hrādinyevābhihato bhārgavavaṃśasaṃbhūtasya bhrāturbrāhnaṇasya
GK19bahcar1u:631: jāyāmakṣamālābhidhānāṃ munikanyakāmātmasūnoḥ saṃvardhanāya niyujya virahāturastapase vanamasāt /
GK19bahcar1u:632: yasminnevāvasare sarasvatyasūta tanayaṃ tasminnevākṣamālāpi sutaṃ prasūtavatī /
GK19bahcar1u:633: tau tu sā nirviśeṣaṃ sāmānyastanyādinā śanaiḥ śanaiḥ śiśū samavardhayat /
GK19bahcar1u:637: atha sārasvato māturmahimnā yauvanārambha evāvirbhūtāśeṣavidyāsaṃbhārastasminsavayasi bhrātari preyasi prāṇasame suhṛdi vatse vāṅmayaṃ samastameva saṃcārayāmāsa /
GK19bahcar1u:638: cakāra ca kṛtadāraparigrahasyāsya tasmiṃnneva pradeśe prītyā prītikūṭanāmānaṃ nivāsam /
GK19bahcar1u:644: jaṭī ca bhūtvā tapasyato janayitureva jagāmāntikam /
GK19bahcar1u:652: askhalitapravṛtto bhāgīrathīpravāha iva pāvanaḥ prāvartata vimalo vaṃśaḥ /
GK19bahcar1u:696: atikrāmati ca kāle prasavaparamparābhiranavaratamāpatati vikāśini vātsyāyanakule,
GK19bahcar1u:697: krameṇa kuberanāmā vainateya iva gurupakṣapāti dvijo janma lebhe /
GK19bahcar1u:698: tasyābhavannacyutar iśāno haraḥ pāśupataśceti catvāro yugārambhā iva brāhnatejojanyamānaprajāvistārā nārāyaṇabāhudaṇjā iva saccakranandakāstanayāḥ
GK19bahcar1u:699: tatra pāśupatasyaika evābhavad bhūbhāra ivācalakulasthitiḥ sthiraścaturudadhigambhīror'thapatiriti nāmnā samagrāgrajanmacakracūḍāmaṇirmahātmā sūnuḥ /
GK19bahcar1u:700: so 'janayad bhṛguṃ haṃsaṃ śuciṃ kaviṃ mahīdataṃ dharmaṃ jātavedasaṃ citrabhānuṃ tryakṣaṃ
GK19bahcar1u:702: alabhata ca citrabhānusteṣāṃ madhye rājadevyabhidhānāyāṃ brāhnaṇyāṃ bāṇamātmajam /
GK19bahcar1u:703: sa bāla eva balavato vidhervaśādupasaṃpannayā vyayujyata jananyā /
GK19bahcar1u:706: kṛtopanayanādikriyākalāpasya samāvṛttasya cāsya caturdaśavarṣadeśīyasya pitāpi śrutismṛtivihitaṃ kṛtvā dvijajanocitaṃ nikhilaṃ puṇyajātaṃ kālenādaśamīstha evāstamagamat /
GK19bahcar1u:707: saṃsthite ca pitari mahatā śokenābhīlamanuprāpto divāniśaṃ dahnamānahṛdayaḥ kathaṅkathamapi katipayāndivasānātmagṛha evānaiṣīt /
GK19bahcar1u:708: gate ca viralatāṃ śoke śanaiḥ śanairavinayanidānatayā svātantrayasya,
GK19bahcar1u:748: satsvapipitṛpitāmahopātteṣu brāhnaṇajanociteṣu vibhaveṣu sati cāvicchinne vidyāprasaṅge gṛhānniragāt /
GK19bahcar1u:749: agācca niravagraho grahavāniva navayauvanena svairiṇā manasā mahatāmupahāsyatām /
GK19bahcar1u:756: mahataśca kālāttameva bhūyo vātsyāyanavaṃśāśramamātmano janmabhuvaṃ brāhnaṇādhivāsamagamatṝ /
GK19bahcar1u:757: tatra ca ciradarśanādabhinavībhūtasnehasadbhāvaiḥ sasaṃstavaprakaṭitajñāteyairāptairutsavadivasa ivānanditāgamano bālamitramaṇḍalamadhyagato mokṣasukhamivānvabhavatṝ /
GK19bahcar1u:758: iti śrīmahākavibāṇamaṭṭakṛtau harṣacarite vātsyāyanavaṃśavarṇanaṃ nāma prathama ucchvāsaḥ
